title: Manchester City 2-1 Aston Villa: What Were The Key Talking Points As Pep Guardiola’s Side Take A Giant Leap Towards A Champions League Ticket?
description: Taking a giant leap towards booking an essential Champions League ticket, Manchester City snatched a last-gasp 2-1 victory against Aston Villa on Tuesday night. The soon-to-be former champions got off to a dream start at the Etihad as Portuguese international Bernardo Silva swept home after just seven minutes. author: Tom Dunstan

title: ´Our incentive is to win our game – Arteta not focused on title permutations
description: If Arsenal lose to Crystal Palace in the Premier League on Wednesday, Liverpool will be crowned champions, but Mikel Arteta says that is not an added incentive to win.
